title: Find the Githyanki Creche
content:
own concern, not mine. Well, thank you for sharing.

Choosing dialogue 2 will not get Shadowheart to talk about the artefact, instead Lae'zel will join in saying it is an artefact of the Githyanki, while Shadowheart says she will not fail her people in returning it to Baldur's Gate. While you become aware how powerful the artefact is, this will give you the following dialogue choices.

Enough, both of you. We need to work together. Keep that thing safe - seems we'll need it. Give me the artefac
